#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

#define LL long long

const LL MOD  = 1e9 + 7;
LL power(LL a, LL b, LL c) {
	LL ret=1; 
	while(b) {
		if(b&1) {
			ret = (ret*a)%c;
		}
		a = (a*a)%c;
		b >>= 1;
	}
	return ret;
}

int main() {
	int t;
	scanf("%d", &t);
	while(t--) {
		LL n, k;
		scanf("%lld %lld", &n, &k);

		if(k == 1) {
			printf("0\n");
		}
		else if(k==2) {
			printf("2\n");
		}
		else{
			long long val = (k-1 + (k-2)*(k-2)) % MOD;
			val = power(val, n-1, MOD);
			val = (((val*k)%MOD)*(k-1))%MOD;
			printf("%lld\n", val);
		}



	}
}
